headline: Assessing Cisco Systems (CSCO) Valuation After Recent Short Term Share Price Softness
summary: Cisco Systems (CSCO) has been drawing attention after a period in which the share price has shown mixed short-term movements, including a decline over the past day and past week, alongside a gain over the past three months. See our latest analysis for Cisco Systems. Stepping back, Cisco Systems’ recent share price softness, including a 1-day share price return decline of 0.46% and a 7-day share price return decline of 2.82%, sits alongside a 1-year total shareholder return of 30.76%.
